title: After All That Has Evolved In This Game.. What Do You Miss The Most?
body:
SO much has changed since I started back in S2. And even more if you started in Beta!

I am not here to argue whether or not changes were good or bad for the game, just to be a little nostalgic about some of the "old" gameplay and balance.


1) I REALLY miss being able to place as many wards down as gold would allow me for support. Yes, the support items and changes were for the best.. but when you got that edge as support and had a bunch of gold to spend.. you could light the entire map up like a Christmas Tree! The advantage your team got (if you were smart enough) was Enormous!  

2) Look at my name.. I miss atmas a lot.

3) I had a friend that loved warmog stacking mundo.. for one day i would love for him to be able to play that again. I really cannot describe the hilarity that was {{champion:36}} {{item:3083}}  {{item:3083}}  {{item:3083}}  {{item:3083}}  {{item:3083}}  {{item:3083}} 

4) I started back in S2 and back then {{champion:20}} was a top tier support. I really miss that because that was the first champ and role I learned. Day 1 of S3 and that was gone :(


What are some things you miss? Even if those changes you probably admit were for the better.

I miss Old Karma I feel that they remove her before her time to shine came.

1.  They remove her then they added Support item like that was what she needed as support. 
2. As for midlaner Karma she would of been OP against the assassin meta that came a bit later after her removal (she would of rekt them).
3.  Lastly she probably could of function very well in the top lane I mean shield for trade and heal for sustain, all she needed to do was wave clear and chill.

She  was a mage but to me she was the best ap fighter maybe even ap juggernaut leaning more on offensive stat then defensive stat. I would even go as far as calling her a drain tank who have good survivability as long as they are doing damage.

I miss old AD Sion (love the new Sion though).  As much hate as he got for being "useless," I remember a game where I was the bot lane ADC and spent about the first 2/3rds of the game farming bot lane and running away from fights.  Then, when my entire team was dead and the enemy team had 2 fed guys (Rengar, Irelia) and Leona pushing down mid, I waited under the mid inhib tower dancing.  When they tried to fight me I got a triple kill.  My team was about as surprised as the enemy and I spent the rest of the game making the enemy run for the hills anytime I showed my face.  I also remember regularly building about 4 actives (Youmuu's, Ravenous Hydra, Merc Scim, Randuin's) so I could axe anyone who said Sion was useless.

However, I probably miss Mordekaiser more.  The new Morde is just too frustrating (for me and my opponents) to play.
